channel.title: Romance on Biblical Romance
channel.description: Recent content in Romance on Biblical Romance

item.title: David And Brittany's Story
item.description: I want to share with you the wonderful story of how God brought Brittany and me together, and how after being betrothed as husband and wife for 8 months, we were married on a beautiful crisp October day.

item.title: I'm interested in someone, now what?
item.description: Am I supposed to spend time with this person in a “non-dating” way, maybe in a group setting? Should I try to go serve where they are? How do I get to know them better? This might be Godâ€™s will, how should I pursue this? What if they are far away?
